summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of EPK authentication gating and navigation logic. All required features working correctly.
passed_tests: EPK page shows login CTA when not authenticated
EPK link correctly hidden in navigation when logged out
Login button navigates to /login page successfully
No console errors on /epk when logged out
Mobile and tablet layouts stable and responsive
Navigation shows correct elements for logged-out state
EPK page accessible via direct URL with proper login prompt
Responsive design works across all viewport sizes
